workshoptitle: Create, Query Vector Indexes in Oracle Database with MongoDB API

tutorials.title: Introduction
tutorials.description: Introduction to Oracle AI Vector Search with MongoDB API.

tutorials.title: Get Started
tutorials.description: This is the prerequisites for customers using Free Trial and Paid tenancies, and Always Free accounts (if applicable). The title of the lab and the Contents Menu title (the title above) match for Prerequisite lab. This lab is always first.

tutorials.title: Lab 1: Provision an Autonomous Database 23ai Free Instance
tutorials.description: Create an Autonomous Database 23ai for this workshop

tutorials.title: Lab 2: Schema flexibility for relational tables - the JSON datatype
tutorials.description: Use the JSON datatype with relational tables

tutorials.title: Lab 3: JSON Collections - the native storage for JSON documents
tutorials.description: Create JSON Collections to store documents in the database

tutorials.title: Lab 4: JSON Duality Views - JSON meets relational
Lab 5: MongoDB Plug-and-Play - Full MongoDB compatibility to work with JSON Collections and Duality Views
tutorials.description: MongoDB compatibility with the MongoDB API

tutorials.title: Need Help?
tutorials.description: Solutions to Common Problems and Directions for Receiving Live Help
